refsection.title: 説明
refsection.para: When the right and left operands are not both of integer type, A | B yields the element-wise logical OR of matrices A and B evaluated as matrices of boolean. A and B must be matrices with the same dimensions or one from them must be a single boolean. If any operand is sparse the result of A | B is sparse encoded.
When both operands are of integer type, A | B yields the bitwise comparison between each element of A and B.

For if and while control structures or when computing A || B, the left operand is evaluated prior to the right operand. If all entries in the left operand are true, the result is set to %t short-circuiting the evaluation of the right operand. Otherwise, A | B is computed.
